title: Build against SDK version 4 and target version 10
message:
Build against SDK version 4 and target version 10

When targeting SDK version 3, "Storage: modify/delete SD card contents"
and "Phone calls: read phone state and identity" permissions are
automatically added.
To fix it, I'm targeting SDK version 10 while leaving minimum version 3.
This requires that I build the app against SDK version 4.

message:

title: Revert "Add event content observer"
message:
Revert "Add event content observer"

Content observer is called multiple times without any apparent reason
which leads to high battery usage.

This reverts commit 708d9a2f5a09d8e5691d340cb8f427512a6d4dd3.

Conflicts:

	src/com/politedroid/PoliteDroid.java
	src/com/politedroid/calendar/Event.java
